Item ID1071

Mithril platelegs are the third best free-to-play platelegs. They require level 20 Defence to equip. A player with 66 Smithing can make it by using three mithril bars on an anvil while carrying a hammer, granting 150 Smithing experience. Mithril platelegs offer similar stats to a mithril plateskirt but weigh more.

[[File:Mithril_platelegs_detail.png|left|90px]]
'''Mithril platelegs''' are the third best free-to-play [[platelegs]]. They require level 20 [[Defence]] to equip. A player with 66 [[Smithing]] can make it by using three [[mithril bar]]s on an [[anvil]] while carrying a [[hammer]], granting 150 Smithing experience. Mithril platelegs offer similar stats to a [[mithril plateskirt]] but weigh more.
